languages.text: {n}Молодой человек прикрывает обожженные губы, подавляя вырывающийся кашель.{/n} "Не жалуется... Кхэ-кхэ-кхэм... Передавала вам поклон и пожелания о скорейшем возвращении".
{n}Achilleas covers his burnt lips, trying and failing to suppress a coughing fit.{/n} "She... she is in good health... She sends her regards to you, as well as her wishes for your swift return."
languages.original_text: {n}Молодой человек прикрывает обожженные губы, подавляя вырывающийся кашель.{/n} "Не жалуется... Кхэ-кхэ-кхэм... Передавала вам поклон и пожелания о скорейшем возвращении".

languages.text: {n}阿吉里亚斯捂着烧伤的嘴唇，想要忍住咳嗽，但失败了。{/n}“她……她身体很好……她让我给你带个好，希望你能早点回来。”
languages.original_text: {n}Achilleas covers his burnt lips, trying and failing to suppress a coughing fit.{/n} "She... she is in good health... She sends her regards to you, as well as her wishes for your swift return."

traits.locale_text: {n}阿吉里亚斯捂着烧伤的嘴唇，想要忍住咳嗽，但失败了。{/n}“她……她身体很好……她让我给你带个好，希望你能早点回来。”

languages.text: {n}Achilleas se tapa los labios quemados, intentando contener un ataque de tos.{/n} «Está... está en buen estado. Le envía recuerdos y espera poder celebrar su pronto regreso».
languages.original_text: {n}Achilleas covers his burnt lips, trying and failing to suppress a coughing fit.{/n} "She... she is in good health... She sends her regards to you, as well as her wishes for your swift return."

traits.locale_text: {n}Achilleas se tapa los labios quemados, intentando contener un ataque de tos.{/n} «Está... está en buen estado. Le envía recuerdos y espera poder celebrar su pronto regreso».

languages.text: {n}アキレアスは焼けた唇を覆って咳の発作を止めようとしたが治まらない。{/n}「彼女…彼女は元気です…陛下によろしくと。もちろん、早く帰ってきて欲しいとも言っていました」
languages.original_text: {n}Achilleas covers his burnt lips, trying and failing to suppress a coughing fit.{/n} "She... she is in good health... She sends her regards to you, as well as her wishes for your swift return."

traits.locale_text: {n}アキレアスは焼けた唇を覆って咳の発作を止めようとしたが治まらない。{/n}「彼女…彼女は元気です…陛下によろしくと。もちろん、早く帰ってきて欲しいとも言っていました」

languages.text: {n}Achilleas bedeckt seine verbrannten Lippen und versucht vergeblich, einen Hustenanfall zu unterdrücken.{/n} "Sie ... sie ist bei guter Gesundheit ... Sie lässt Euch grüßen und wünscht sich Eure baldige Rückkehr."
languages.original_text: {n}Achilleas covers his burnt lips, trying and failing to suppress a coughing fit.{/n} "She... she is in good health... She sends her regards to you, as well as her wishes for your swift return."

traits.locale_text: {n}Achilleas bedeckt seine verbrannten Lippen und versucht vergeblich, einen Hustenanfall zu unterdrücken.{/n} "Sie ... sie ist bei guter Gesundheit ... Sie lässt Euch grüßen und wünscht sich Eure baldige Rückkehr."

languages.text: {n}Achilleas couvre ses lèvres brûlées dans une vaine tentative de réprimer une nouvelle quinte de toux.{/n} « Elle... Elle va très bien... Elle vous transmet ses plus sincères salutations et souhaite votre prompt retour. »
languages.original_text: {n}Achilleas covers his burnt lips, trying and failing to suppress a coughing fit.{/n} "She... she is in good health... She sends her regards to you, as well as her wishes for your swift return."

traits.locale_text: {n}Achilleas couvre ses lèvres brûlées dans une vaine tentative de réprimer une nouvelle quinte de toux.{/n} « Elle... Elle va très bien... Elle vous transmet ses plus sincères salutations et souhaite votre prompt retour. »

languages.text: {n}Achilleas, yanmış dudaklarını kapatıp öksürük nöbetini bastırmaya çalışsa da başaramıyor.{/n} "Kendisi iyi durumda. Size saygılarını iletip kısa süre içinde geri dönmenizi dilediğini söyledi."
languages.original_text: {n}Achilleas covers his burnt lips, trying and failing to suppress a coughing fit.{/n} "She... she is in good health... She sends her regards to you, as well as her wishes for your swift return."

traits.locale_text: {n}Achilleas yanmış dudaklarını kapatarak bir öksürük nöbetini bastırmaya çalışıyor ama başaramıyor.{/n} "Kendisi iyi durumda. Size saygılarını iletti ve kısa süre içinde geri dönmenizi dilediğini söyledi."
